citeinfo.title: BND_State_1997

pubinfo.publish: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center

citeinfo.othercit: Suggested bibliographic reference: RIGIS, 2016. State Boundary (1997); state97b. Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System, URL: http://www.rigis.org, Environmental Data Center, University of Rhode Island, Kingston, Rhode Island (last date accessed: 16 May 2016).

citeinfo.title: Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System

descript.abstract:
Representative political boundary lines for the State of Rhode Island. Includes physical shoreline features for bay and coastal waters. General mapping, graphic display and GIS analysis of the State of Rhode Island political boundary.
These data were originally published to RIGIS in 1997, and are considered the "preferred" state boundary dataset.
descript.purpose: Representative political boundary lines for the State of Rhode Island.

idinfo.useconst:
These data are shared under the RIGIS license agreement, which can be viewed below:

Please acknowledge both RIGIS and the primary producer(s) of this dataset in any derived products. Versions of the RIGIS logo suitable for both printed and web-based products are available at http://www.rigis.org/logos.

dataqual.complete: Represents all five of Rhode Island's counties.

procstep.procdesc: Updated Point of Contact information for this dataset from "Stephen Kut" to "Erica Tefft."

procstep.procdesc: Dissolved the Municipal Boundaries (1997) dataset available from RIGIS based upon its LAND attribute field.

procstep.procdesc: There were 6 polygons with no associated attribute features, these were updated based on recent updates made to the muni97 dataset.
